Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cylinder, Fireball, Sphere
divs: Sighting DetailsI had noticed bright light in sky for a while no stars were present. curious I got my camcorder out and starting videooing and realized what I was seeing was changing shapes such as spheres and cigar like shape. So night after night I'd go out and same exact time the "UFO" would appear so I started looking aroud and realized that approx a mile down the road the exact object is in align with the one above my house. However the other object travels the other way. The more you watch the sky the more you realize what you glance at and believe are stars are actually other objects and I have videoed several. Last night total count actually surounding my house was approx 10. I do live on 100+ acres so area is large. I'd love for someone to come and investigate just not sure who to contact.
Summary: I observe these sightings every night of the week appears more as time go on saw about 10 last night have video
trends: There has been one other sighting in Tyrone
There were no other sightings in Tyrone on or around November 8th 2011
